overview: Roger is currently VP Products and Platform at Mavenlink.com Mr. Neel has 10 years of consulting experience in the development of social networking and knowledge management products for companies in many different industries such as Apple, 3M, and Bank of America. In his career he has directed new product development, alliances, sales and delivery. As an entrepreneur and consultant he reliably predicts major technology changes and trends. Being one to always seek the next big technology shift, he has explored and used nearly every language platform and has selected Ruby on Rails as Mavenlink’s framework of choice. Mr. Neel holds a B.A. in Computer Science and Economics from Cornell University.
